This property verifies that the CarrierSenseLost signal is deasserted one clock cycle after the Reset signal becomes active. 

The property triggers on every rising edge of the MTxClk clock. When the Reset signal transitions to logic 1, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, the CarrierSenseLost signal must be at logic 0. The property is disabled and not checked when Reset is at logic 0.
